rules_text:
Covert [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures that weren't under their controllers control since the start of their last turn.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control with covert deals combat damage to an opponent and/or a permanent they protect, you get {E}.
Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Return up to two target creatures with different controllers each to their owners' hands. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
